DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe. The aim of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of biphasic insulin aspart (NovoMixÂ® 30) in hospitalised patients with type 2 diabetes with the aim of intensifying their treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Safety of Treatment Initiation With Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 in Hospitalised Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart, insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Patients with type 2 diabetes Treated with oral antidiabetics and/or human insulin Persons previously included in the trial Hypersensitive to biphasic insulin aspart or any of the excipients Pregnant or lactating women, or those who plan to get pregnant within the next 12 months
